mapper.insert: insert into USER( user_id, user_gender, user_birth, user_email, user_auth, user_admin, user_name, user_phone, user_password) values( #{user_id}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_email}, #{user_auth}, #{user_admin}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_password} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM USER WHERE user_email = #{email}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RN FROM (SELECT * FROM QA where
user_id like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') or qa_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') or qa_content like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
qa_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
qa_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') or qa_content like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
qa_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') or qa_content like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
ORDER BY qa_date DESC)A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) D
)B WHERE rn > (#{page}-1) * #{amount} AND rn <= #{page} * #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM USER WHERE user_name = #{user_name} and user_email = #{user_email}
SELECT user_id FROM USER WHERE user_name = #{user_name} and user_email = #{user_email}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{user_id} and user_email = #{user_email}

select count(*) from USER
where user_email like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
where (user_id like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') or user_email like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%'))
where user_id like CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')

SELECT USER.user_id, MOVIE_LIKE.MOVIE_KOFICCD, MOVIE.MOVIE_NM, MOVIE.MOVIE_Iurl FROM USER LEFT JOIN MOVIE_LIKE ON USER.USER_ID = MOVIE_LIKE.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE ON MOVIE_LIKE.MOVIE_KOFICCD = MOVIE.MOVIE_KOFICCD where USER.user_id = #{user_id}
select substring(user_date, 1,4) as year, substring(user_date,6,2) as month, count(*) as count from USER where user_date like #{month};

SELECT USER.user_id, MOVIE.MOVIE_KOFICCD, MOVIE.MOVIE_NM, MOVIE.MOVIE_Iurl FROM USER LEFT JOIN BUY ON USER.user_id = BUY.user_id LEFT JOIN MOVIE ON BUY.MOVIE_KOFICCD = MOVIE.MOVIE_KOFICCD where USER.user_id=#{user_id}

SELECT USER.user_id, MOVIE.MOVIE_KOFICCD, MOVIE.MOVIE_NM, MOVIE.MOVIE_Iurl, RENT.RENT_ENDDATE, RENT.RENT_STARTDATE FROM USER LEFT JOIN RENT ON USER.user_id = RENT.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE ON RENT.MOVIE_KOFICCD = MOVIE.MOVIE_KOFICCD where USER.user_id = #{user_id}
